scripts.deploy:aws:s3: aws s3 rm s3://covid19mexico.net --recursive && aws s3 sync ./dist s3://covid19mexico.net
scripts.deploy:aws:s3:cache: aws s3 cp --cache-control max-age=0 --metadata-directive=REPLACE s3://covid19mexico.net/index.html s3://covid19mexico.net/index.html
scripts.deploy:aws:s3:cache2: aws s3 cp --cache-control max-age=0 --content-type=application/javascript --metadata-directive=REPLACE s3://covid19mexico.net/service-worker.js s3://covid19mexico.net/service-worker.js
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:aws:s3 && npm run deploy:aws:s3:mime && npm run deploy:aws:s3:cache && npm run deploy:aws:s3:cache2 && npm run deploy:aws:cf
